text: Akho ki jekara tuhade pita, bete, bhara, patani'am, parivara, sapati jihari tusim kama'i hai ate uha karobara jisa de bada hona tom tusi ghabara'unde ho ate uha ghara jisa nu tusim pasada karade ho iha sara kujha alaha ate usa de rasula de maraga vica jihada karana tom vi zi'ada pi'ara hai tam udom taka udika karo jadom taka alaha apana hukama na bheje. Alaha inakari'am nu raha nahim vikha'unda
